doc.title: Bipolar Light
doc.plot: Bipolar Light ... because it is a light showing the way, it is en-lightening, and you won't gain weight from watching it. Through the example of bipolar, the biggest secrets to relationships and the structure of the mind are revealed. Over 25,000 people have attended Dr. Jay's seminars. Dr. Jay talks about his family with bipolar disorder in a humorous and loving way.
